mapper.insert: insert into booking(bookcode, roomcode, human, checkin, checkout, total, name, mobile) values (seq_book.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, #{param7})
mapper.select: select a.bookcode, b.name roomname, b.type typename, a.human, b.howmany, a.checkin, a.checkout, a.total, a.mobile, a.name from booking a, room b where a.checkout > #{param2} and #{param1} > a.checkin and a.roomcode=b.roomcode order by a.checkin;
